Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ServerSocket

Class MainServerTCP

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.Server
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ServerSocket.MainServerTCP
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObserverMessageToServer<MessageToServer>
public class MainServerTCP extends Server implements ObserverMessageToServer<MessageToServer>
This class is the TCP main server. It extends Server and implements ObserverMessageToServer<MessageToServer>. It can be instanced only once (singleton pattern). It receives MessageToServer from MessageToServerDispatcher concerning game handling (e.g. create new game, register to game...) and heart beat message.

  • Field Details

    • connectedClients

      private final HashMap<Socket,Triplet<ClientHandlerSocket,MessageToServerDispatcher,String>> connectedClients
      Infos about connected clients: it's a HashMap with Socket as key and (ClientHandlerSocket, MessageToServerDispatcher, nickname) as values.

    • pendingSocketToKill

      private final HashMap<Socket,Long> pendingSocketToKill
      This HashMap contains all Socket that have been removed from lastHeartBeatOfClients (because of heartbeat) but can still reconnect. The value is the timestamp in which Socket has been removed from lastHeartBeatOfClients

    • lastHeartBeatOfClients

      private final ConcurrentHashMap<Socket,Long> lastHeartBeatOfClients
      This ConcurrentHashMap contains, for each Socket, the timestamp of its last heartbeat.

    • gameHandlingMessageHandler

      private final MainServerTCP.MessageToMainServerVisitor gameHandlingMessageHandler

    • inactiveClientKillerExecutor

      private final ScheduledExecutorService inactiveClientKillerExecutor
      Scheduled Executor Service used to disconnect inactive Socket contained in pendingSocketToKill

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Socket senderSocket, MessageToServer message)
      This method is used by MessageToServerDispatcher to notify TCP server that a new message has arrived and hence has to be opened. Thread executing this method will wait until Socket from which it's receiving messages is put inside connected clients hashmap.
      Specified by:
      update in interface ObserverMessageToServer<MessageToServer>
      Parameters:
      senderSocket - Socket from which message has arrived
      message - MessageToServer arrived

    • accept

      public boolean accept(MessageToServer message)
      This method tells caller that message can be accepted by the object
      Specified by:
      accept in interface ObserverMessageToServer<MessageToServer>
      Parameters:
      message - MessageToServer that could be accepted
      Returns:
      true if and only if message can be accepted

    • registerSocket

      public void registerSocket(Socket socket, MessageToServerDispatcher messageToServerDispatcher)
      This method is called by TCPConnectionAcceptor to notify that a client has only connected but has sent nothing
      Parameters:
      socket - Socket is the client's socket

    • getClientHandlerFromSocket

      private ClientHandlerSocket getClientHandlerFromSocket(Socket socket)
      This method is used to find ClientHandlerSocket from socket. If socket is not registered inside connected clients hashmap it returns null. If socket is registered but its client handler hasn't any token it sends to client a NetworkHandlingErrorMessage (with NetworkError.CLIENT_NOT_REGISTERED_TO_SERVER)
      Parameters:
      socket - socket to search for inside connected clients hash map
      Returns:
      ClientHandlerSocket is socket has his client handler and client has already sent a NewUserMessage otherwise returns null.

    • closeSocket

      private void closeSocket(Socket socket)
      This method is used to close .
      Parameters:
      socket - socket to close.

    • runInactiveClientKiller

      private void runInactiveClientKiller()
      This method is used to close socket and (consequently freeing name) of clients that are inactive for more than Settings.TIME_TO_WAIT_BEFORE_CLIENT_HANDLER_KILL seconds.

    • disconnectSocket

      private void disconnectSocket(Socket socket)
      This method removes socket associated to the client who sent the message from both connectedClients and lastHeartBeatOfClients, notify MainController that a client has to be disconnected and, lastly, it interrupts ClientHandlerSocket and MessageToServerDispatcher thread. It also removes from pendingSocketToKill.
      Parameters:
      socket - Socket to kill

    • runHeartBeatTesterForClient

      protected void runHeartBeatTesterForClient()
      This method is used to check heart beat timing of connected clients. If client do not send heart beat message for more than Settings.MAX_DELTA_TIME_BETWEEN_HEARTBEATS it deletes it from lastHeartBeatOfClients hashmap, it sets it to inactive using MainController.setPlayerInactive(String). It doesn't remove it from connectedClients hashmap because client can reconnect, and thus it is necessary to keep its private token.
      Specified by:
      runHeartBeatTesterForClient in class Server

    • resetServer

      public void resetServer()
      This method is used to reset main TCP server and main controller.
      Specified by:
      resetServer in class Server

    • killClientHandlers

      public void killClientHandlers()
      This method is used to interrupt clients' handler and message dispatcher thread It removes them as observers from MessageToServerDispatcher.
      Specified by:
      killClientHandlers in class Server
